title: Wild Card Wildness
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss who had the most impressive wins in the AFC East and NFC East, what the biggest surprise was from Wild Card weekend and if they understand why that roughing the passer call was called against the Falcons.

itunes:subtitle: PTI: The most impressive wins from this weekend and who surprised the most from this weekend's Wild Card Weekend.
